about_the_game:
Newcomers to the exicting world of club football management or coaching veterans alike will find guides, tips and tricks to all aspects of the game. Curated with the development team you’ll get all the information needed to lead your team to victory and your club to an economically sound foundation.

Content (*)
  • Pre-Season preparations
  • Finances
  • Contract negotiations
  • Merchandise
  • Staff
  • Private life
  • Squad analysis
  • Transfer market
  • Formations
  • Matchday
  • Youth Academy
  • Half-time team talks
(*) Currently the Guide is only available in German, the English version will be available shortly. During the course of the Early Access phase more features, tips and tricks will be added as they appear in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel processor running at 2.6 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 1GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel processor running at 3.3 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
